content: Developer token successfully copied to clipboard

comment.text: The "DeveloperTokenCopied" translation key is used to display a success message when a developer token is successfully copied to the clipboard in a Generate Developer Token dialog. This message appears after clicking the copy button and indicates that the token has been successfully duplicated for the user's reference.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'buferə' is a less common and potentially incorrect transliteration of 'clipboard'. A more standard term would be 'keçid xətti'.

The translation 'Означението на програмиста е успешно копирано в клипборда' is not an accurate translation of 'Developer token successfully copied to clipboard'. 'Означението на програмиста' translates to 'Developer identification/designation' which isn't quite right. 'Developer token' is a specific term and requires a closer translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation might be something like 'Токенът на програмиста е успешно копиран в клипборда' (Token-a na programistata e uspeshno kopiran v klipbordata).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation contains extra spaces before and after the double quotes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the extra spaces: "Le jeton du développeur a été copié avec succès dans le presse-papiers"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The hyphen in 'token' is unnecessary in Armenian. It should be written as one word.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մշակողի token-ը should be Մշակողի տոքենը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පසුරු' (pasuru) is an archaic or less common term for 'clipboard'. A more standard and understandable term would be 'clipboard'.

While technically correct, the translation 'සංවර්ධක ටෝකනය සාර්ථකව පසුරු පුවරුවට පිටපත් කරන ලදී' sounds quite formal and somewhat unnatural in modern Sinhala usage. A more natural phrasing would prioritize clarity and ease of understanding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a simpler phrasing like 'සංවර්ධක ටෝකනය clipboard වෙත පිටපත් කරන ලදී' or 'developer token clipboard වෙත පිටපත් විය'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Developer token' is best translated as 'Token za programera' instead of 'Токен програмера'. While understandable, the latter sounds slightly less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Токен за програмера успешно копиран у међумеморију

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Token programera' is slightly awkward. 'Token za programera' would be more natural and idiomatic Serbian (Latin).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Token za programera uspešno kopiran u međumemoriju

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, using the more common 'u isečnu tablu' instead of 'u međumemoriju' aligns better with everyday language. 'Međumemorija' is more general.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Token za programera uspešno kopiran u isečnu tablu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Đã sao chép thành công mã token của nhà phát triển vào bộ nhớ tạm' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. While technically correct, it doesn't flow as well as it could.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đã sao chép thành công mã token nhà phát triển vào bảng nhớ tạm.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'mã token của nhà phát triển' is a bit clunky. It could be more concise.
